Automatic Plant Watering System
17.11.2017 â”€ Aabhas & Vimarsh Zydus School for Excellence Vejalpur
Overview
Taking care of Plants when we are not at home is a major concern for all the plant lovers. Instead of buying all costly watering system that waters at particular time interval ; we here present a system that checks your soil moisture level and accordingly pumps water to your plants.
Goals
To keep the soil moisture appropriate to plantâ€™s requirement.
No need to worry of plantâ€™s wilting when no oneâ€™s there to water your plants.
Specifications
This system uses a soil moisture sensor to check the water level in the soil and if it decreases it turns on a water pump thatâ€™s connected to a source of water. This system is very cheap and is able to work almost all the time. So you can be tension free when you are out as your plants are getting their required supply of water regularly.
